info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 8:06AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Whiteside, southeastern Jo Daviess, Carroll, southwestern Stephenson, Jackson, northwestern Cedar, south central Dubuque, north central Johnson, Jones, southeastern Linn and northern Clinton Counties through 900 AM CST... At 805 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mount Vernon to near Oxford Junction to near Charlotte to Argo Fay to Sterling. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Freeport, Sterling, Rock Falls, Maquoketa, Anamosa, Mount Carroll, Mechanicsville, Mount Vernon, Monticello, Savanna, Bellevue, Lisbon, Ely, Lanark, Milledgeville, Preston, Fairhaven, Hanover, Pearl City and Elizabeth. This includes Interstate 88 between mile markers 34 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
